title: Tynt
description: Welcome to www.tynt.com (the “Site”), a website owned and controlled by Tynt Multimedia Inc. (“Tynt”, “we”, “us”, or “our”). We operate the Site, and Tynt software products and services made available through the Site (collectively the “Services”), which make link creation in copied and pasted content effortless to readers and, in certain cases, enables easier searches from copied content.
